text: Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Akhraja Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Min Diyarihim Li'wwali Al-Hashri Ma Zanantum 'An Yakhruju Wa Zannu 'Annahum Mani`atuhum Husunuhum Mina Allahi Fa'atahumu Allahu Min Haythu Lam Yahtasibu Wa Qadhafa Fi Qulubihimu Ar-Ru`ba Yukhribuna Buyutahum Bi'aydihim Wa 'Aydi Al-Mu'uminina Fa`tabiru Ya 'Uli Al-'Absari
